title: Getting Started
pageDescription: VK Cloud (VK Cloud) platform provides the infrastructure for developing and operating applications. A pay-for-resource model allows users to optimize their application infrastructure costs. VK Cloud provides infrastructure and platform services for the rapid creation of cloud applications, expert support, custom and private installations, and consulting services. As part of a large technology holding, VK Cloud has access to cutting-edge technology and shares best practices and cost-effective solutions. For large companies VK Cloud acts as a technology partner for digitalization. VK Cloud provides infrastructure and platform services, expert support, custom and private installations, and consulting services.
shortDescription: Information about services, personal account, legal information and details
